root.text: This talk session will briefly discuss about the types of materials and their functional properties  in solar energy. The solar energy sector in India and it's upcoming transitions. The materials research and it's impact on the field of solar energy.

text: 10:00 AM – 11:45 AM - Types of solar Materials and their sectors in India
11:45 AM – 12:00 PM - Upcoming transitions in the solar materials.

Participants must have a valid ID card of their respective educational institutions.
